Root not found, enable KeyLogger accessibility in \"settings - accessibility - services - child accessibility\" You need to activate the draw over other apps permission to be able to take photos You need to activate the "Applications with use access" permission to obtain social credentials Successful KeyLogger accessibility
Child accessibility Child accessibility allows users to prevent, or limit access to, their handling, or their content to minors You need to enable the accessibility service so that the application works correctly. ENABLE SERVICE ACCESSIBILITY ENABLE OVERDRAW CAMERA ENABLE USAGE STATS

Permission request
Permission is required to read contacts, location, record audio, read phone status, receive sms, camera and write storage for this application. Do you want to try again? Some permissions were denied, without them the application will not work correctly. To activate them you must go to \"Settings - applications - child - permissions\" and activate the corresponding permissions. Do you want to activate them now?
Permission is required to read/write storage for this application. The storage permission was denied, without it the application will not work correctly. To activate them you must go to \"Settings - applications - Pyxis - permissions\" and activate the corresponding permissions. Do you want to activate them now?
